title: Principles of Composite Material Mechanics 3rd Ed c2012 Gibson
description:
Principles of Composite Material Mechanics, 3rd Edition (c2012), textbook by Ronald F. Gibson.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" https://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9781439850053" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9781439850053</a>

AUDIENCE: Senior undergrad and grad students in Mechanical and Aeronautics /
          Aerospace Engineering, and Materials Science. Practicing engineers in
          related fields.

SUMMARY: Presents a unique blend of classical and contemporary mechanics of
         composites technologies. While continuing to cover classical methods,
         this edition also includes frequent references to current state-
         of-the-art composites technology and research findings.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. Introduction
2. Lamina Stress-Strain Relationships
3. Effective Moduli of a Continuous Fiber-Reinforced Lamina
4. Strength of a Continuous Fiber-Reinforced Lamina
5. Analysis of Lamina Hygrothermal Behavior
6. Analysis of a Discontinuously Reinforced Lamina
7. Analysis of Laminates
8. Analysis of Viscoelastic and Dynamic Behavior
9. Analysis of Fracture
10. Mechanical Testing of Composites and Their Constituents
APPENDICES:
 A: Matrix Concepts and Operations
 B: Stress Equilibrium Equations
 C: Strain-Displacement Equations
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: page-numbered, bookmarked, true PDF
